thread.title: Volcano eruption in Japan sparks some evacuations

title: Volcano eruption in Japan sparks some evacuations
text:
Volcano eruption in Japan sparks some evacuations 12:20pm IST - 00:59 
Japanese volcano Mount Io erupts for the first time in 250 years, spewing smoke and rocks into the sky and prompting authorities to issue evacuation of nearby mountain lodges and inns. No reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Japanese volcano Mount Io erupts for the first time in 250 years, spewing smoke and rocks into the sky and prompting authorities to issue evacuation of nearby mountain lodges and inns.
